entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
